title: Single storyline – product anxiety dump
transcript: 昨天又熬夜做 flow，感觉脑子被塞满。其实我只是想把“说出 → 审视 → 激发 → 收集 → 再写下去”这个循环跑起来，可是 UI 每次改完都觉得还是 noisy。我想把主线总结给未来的我听——到底是产品定位不稳，还是我自己在逃避 launch？
stress_test_goal: Ensure the prompt outputs one polished paragraph when everything is one thread.
expected_structure: Single paragraph that keeps the reflective tone and highlights the core doubt about定位 vs 自我拖延。
success_rubric: Mentions the thinking loop explicitly or implicitly.
Retains the comparison between product positioning and personal procrastination.
Keeps the bilingual flavor without switching entirely to English.

title: Multi-branch brainstorming about onboarding
language_profile: Chinese primary, English keywords for UI states
transcript: 主线是 onboarding，尤其是语音入口怎么引导。支线 A：首次启动时要不要直接弹一个“说出第一条想法”的 CTA？支线 B：我需要一个 highlights 面板，把 AI 总结放在右侧卡片。支线 C：如果用户一次录了多个片段，AI 要怎么判断主线 vs side quest？
stress_test_goal: Prompt should detect multiple branches and split into sections.
expected_structure: Main Summary + sections such as CTA Strategy / Layout / Multi-clip Logic.
success_rubric: Highlights onboarding as the core storyline.
Each branch gets its own paragraph or bullet group.
Keeps CTA wording and layout concept intact.

title: Emotional vent + actionable insight
transcript: 我今天整个人 collapse。录音一堆，但我心里最想说的是：I need a ritual before dumping thoughts，不然每次打开 App 都像被噪音淹没。可其实那个 ritual 也许只是一个 3 秒 breathing animation? maybe. 另外想提醒自己：别忘了在编辑页做一个 emotional check-in slider。
stress_test_goal: See if prompt can surface emotion while extracting two actionable ideas.
expected_structure: Main Summary that keeps mood, plus subsections for Ritual Idea and Editor Enhancements.
success_rubric: Emotional slider requirement is clearly labeled.

title: Long wandering transcript with labeled headings
transcript:
# 核心主线
想实现一个 living-note，所有碎片随时被吸附。# 支线
1. AI 要自动识别「主线」并在顶部生成 summary。
2. 如果出现多支线，就拆成模块，像 side bar。
3. Highlight 之前的 open questions，别淹没。
# 记录
其实这些就是想在 prompt 里强调的条目。
stress_test_goal: Ensure prompt respects # 核心主线 anchor and reuses headings.
expected_structure: Keep # 核心主线 first, gently rewrite content, keep sections for 支线 and 记录.
success_rubric: List items clarified but not merged away.

title: Messy audio-derived transcript
transcript: 嗯...我刚刚想到一个 layering 的方式，就是先把所有语音片段按时间堆成 stack，然后 AI 先找出 recurring motif，比如“自我怀疑”、“要做 side panel”这些，然后给我一个可以勾选的列表。我还想让 AI 帮我 paraphrase 成更短的 bullet，方便我后来 drag 到编辑区。还有一个 idea，是不是可以在 paraphrase 左边标一个 emoji？这样我可以用颜色扫一眼。
stress_test_goal: Prompt should transform messy filler-rich text into clear modules with actionable bullets.
expected_structure: Main Summary + modules for Layering Flow, Motif Detection, Visual Tagging.
success_rubric: Explains stacking idea before motif detection.
